title: References (Part 9)
content:
References

References (Part 9)

Continued References [119-131]

  • [119] Deqian Kong et al. - Latent plan transformer for trajectory abstraction: Planning as latent space inference (2024)
  • [120] Xidong Feng et al. - Alphazero-like tree-search can guide large language model decoding and training (2023)
  • [121] Jaesik Yoon et al. - Monte carlo tree diffusion for system 2 planning (2025)
  • [122] John Schultz et al. - Mastering board games by external and internal planning with language models (2024)
  • [123] Zhiliang Chen et al. - Broaden your scope! Efficient multi-turn conversation planning for llms with semantic space (2025)
  • [124] Yuxi Xie et al. - Self-evaluation guided beam search for reasoning (2024)
  • [125] Olga Golovneva et al. - Pathfinder: Guided search over multi-step reasoning paths (2023)
  • [126] Haofu Qian et al. - Discriminator-guided plan for embodied reasoning for llm agent (2025)
  • [127] Kanishk Gandhi et al. - Stream of search (sos): Learning to search in language (2024)
  • [128] Swarnadeep Saha et al. - System-1.x: Learning to balance fast and slow planning with language models (2024)
  • [129] Yanchu Guan et al. - Intelligent virtual assistants with llm-based process automation (2023)
  • [130] Junjie Chen et al. - Enhancing llm-based agents via global planning and hierarchical execution (2024)
  • [131] Zican Hu et al. - Divide and conquer: Grounding llms as efficient decision-making agents via offline hierarchical reinforcement learning (2025)

Analysis & Explanation

Advanced Planning Methods

Key Contributions
  • Diffusion Planning: Monte Carlo tree diffusion
  • Hierarchical: Global planning + local execution
  • System 1/2: Fast vs slow reasoning balance
